author: Maul

text:
Virgin has it's own everything. Virgin trains, Virgin holidays, Virgin Wines, Virgin drinks, Virgin Galactic, Virgin Media, Virgin Mobile, Virgin Credit card, Virgin Records, Virgin Airways...

So yeah, they also made Virgin Games. Cool Spot was also the mascot for 7-up, hence the bottle he rides at the start. Capitalism everywhere.

text: No WAY XD I was literally just looking at videos of this game yesterday after remembering it, having found our megadrive and a copy of it.
